#summary Changes in each release of Sipdroid
#labels Featured

=== Beta-Versions ===

  * 1.0.4
    * Enable calling messenger users on GTalk, AIM, MSN, Yahoo, ICQ
    * Add callthru option

  * 1.0.3
    * Replaced "prefix" option with a "search & replace" (issue 83)
    * Bugfixes

  * 1.0.2
    * Receive calls over SIP (call forking is obsolete)
    * Fix issues 74, 77, 81

  * 1.0.1
    * Fix issue 27
    * Add ringtone

  * 1.0.0
    * Fix issue 15 (accept any realm for auth)
    * Add callback option

  * 0.9.11
    * Add location upload to webcall pages

  * 0.9.10
    * Add WLAN active option

  * 0.9.9
    * Improve voice quality
    * Fix issues 58, 61

  * 0.9.8
    * Add video reception
    * Add exclude pattern (issues 11, 34)

  * 0.9.7
    * Video transmission (tested to X-Lite)

  * 0.9.6
    * Fix issues 17, 36 "custom prefix",
    * 17 "vibrate on incoming"
    * Change escape digit from # to +

  * 0.9.5
    * Fix issues 33, 6 "register on HTC build of android"
    * Speakerphone
    * sip: intents

  * 0.9.4
    * Fix issue 25

  * 0.9.3
    * UI bugs fixed

  * 0.9
    * First public beta on Apr 27, 2009
